alert.note: Alert for Searcy (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 25 at 2:21AM CDT until March 26 at 6:01PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Little Rock AR has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Arkansas... Buffalo River Near St Joe affecting Searcy County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD ADVISORY... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Buffalo River Near St Joe. * WHEN...Until Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 27.0 feet, Tyler Bend Access Area begins to flood. Some campsites are under water and Comfort Station is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:45 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 26.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early this morning to a crest of 28.0 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage this afternoon. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecast 1 AM Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Crest Time Date Buffalo River St Joe 27.0 26.8 Sat 1 AM 22.4 14.3 8.1 28.0 7 AM 3/25 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall forecasted to occur over the next 24 hours. During periods of flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall forecasts. Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at... www.weather.gov/lzk Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS.
